MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich affecting properties in Mill Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:24PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:17PM on 14th February 2021.
